Introduction to the waterquality package

Richard Johansen, Jakub Nowosad

2018-06-20

Source: vignettes/intro.Rmd
intro.Rmd

intro:

  • What is the role of this package?
  • Which are the quality metrics supported?
  • What is the type of input data are supported?

Data preparation

  • How to prepare the data to be used by waterquality?
  • Show the whole process, from data download (e.g. landsat), data crop (keeping only the lake), to creation of the final RasterStack

Single algorithm calculation

  • Show an example of using just one algorithm
  • Create a map
  • Explain the result + mention when it is important

Multiple algorithm calculation

  • Explain how the wq_calc() function works
  • Give one or two examples of its use
